frontmatter.title: Slyder
frontmatter.description: Free-to-play puzzle game. Slide your tile into the goal, with a twist.

pageContext.html:
Slyder is a web-based puzzle game based around the idea of mirrored tile moving playable at lukasbach.github.io/slyder/. It was developed using TypeScript and the Konva library.

There are not a lot of levels to play, but you can define your own levels as described here.

Screenshots

Developing and Deploying

If you want to download and run the game locally, you can do so by following the usual npm/yarn workflow, yarn && yarn start to run the game and yarn && yarn run build to build independent deployment artifacts.
